NOBLACK(6D)                                         NOBLACK(6D)





NAME
       noblack - remove all the black from an image

SYNOPSIS
       noblack inimage.rgb outimage.rgb

DESCRIPTION
       noblack  scales  each  pixel in an RGB image so at least
       one of its components is 255. This  has  the  effect  of
       removing all the black from an image.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004               NOBLACK(6D)
